spec.parsedQuery: marathon-game-data.marathon-game-data.aggregate([{"$match":{"scenario name":"Marathon"}},{"$group":{"_id":null,"pistolFired":{"$sum":{"$toInt":{"$ifNull":["$pistol bullets fired",0]}}},"pistolHits":{"$sum":{"$toInt":{"$ifNull":["$pistol bullets hit",0]}}},"fusion_pistolFired":{"$sum":{"$toInt":{"$ifNull":["$fusion bolt minors fired",0]}}},"fusion_pistolHits":{"$sum":{"$toInt":{"$ifNull":["$fusion bolt minors hit",0]}}},"charged_fusion_pistolFired":{"$sum":{"$toInt":{"$ifNull":["$fusion bolt majors fired",0]}}},"charged_fusion_pistolHits":{"$sum":{"$toInt":{"$ifNull":["$fusion bolt majors hit",0]}}},"rifleFired":{"$sum":{"$toInt":{"$ifNull":["$rifle bullets fired",0]}}},"rifleHits":{"$sum":{"$toInt":{"$ifNull":["$rifle bullets hit",0]}}},"grenade_launcherFired":{"$sum":{"$toInt":{"$ifNull":["$grenades fired",0]}}},"grenade_launcherHits":{"$sum":{"$toInt":{"$ifNull":["$grenades hit",0]}}},"flame_throwerFired":{"$sum":{"$toInt":{"$ifNull":["$flamethrower bursts fired",0]}}},"flame_throwerHits":{"$sum":{"$toInt":{"$ifNull":["$flamethrower bursts hit",0]}}}}},{"$project":{"_id":0,"weapons":[{"name":"Pistol","image":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/petewall/marathon-dashboards/refs/heads/main/images/weapons/pistol-m1.png","fired":"$pistolFired","hits":"$pistolHits","accuracy":{"$cond":[{"$eq":["$pistolFired",0]},0,{"$divide":["$pistolHits","$pistolFired"]}]}},{"name":"Fusion Pistol","image":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/petewall/marathon-dashboards/refs/heads/main/images/weapons/fusion-m1.png","fired":"$fusion_pistolFired","hits":"$fusion_pistolHits","accuracy":{"$cond":[{"$eq":["$fusion_pistolFired",0]},0,{"$divide":["$fusion_pistolHits","$fusion_pistolFired"]}]}},{"name":"Charged Fusion Pistol","image":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/petewall/marathon-dashboards/refs/heads/main/images/weapons/fusion-m1.png","fired":"$charged_fusion_pistolFired","hits":"$charged_fusion_pistolHits","accuracy":{"$cond":[{"$eq":["$charged_fusion_pistolFired",0]},0,{"$divide":["$charged_fusion_pistolHits","$charged_fusion_pistolFired"]}]}},{"name":"Rifle","image":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/petewall/marathon-dashboards/refs/heads/main/images/weapons/rifle-m1.png","fired":"$rifleFired","hits":"$rifleHits","accuracy":{"$cond":[{"$eq":["$rifleFired",0]},0,{"$divide":["$rifleHits","$rifleFired"]}]}},{"name":"Grenade Launcher","image":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/petewall/marathon-dashboards/refs/heads/main/images/weapons/rifle-m1.png","fired":"$grenade_launcherFired","hits":"$grenade_launcherHits","accuracy":{"$cond":[{"$eq":["$grenade_launcherFired",0]},0,{"$divide":["$grenade_launcherHits","$grenade_launcherFired"]}]}},{"name":"Flame Thrower","image":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/petewall/marathon-dashboards/refs/heads/main/images/weapons/flame-m1.png","fired":"$flame_throwerFired","hits":"$flame_throwerHits","accuracy":{"$cond":[{"$eq":["$flame_throwerFired",0]},0,{"$divide":["$flame_throwerHits","$flame_throwerFired"]}]}}]}},{"$unwind":"$weapons"},{"$replaceRoot":{"newRoot":"$weapons"}}])
